text: madyanile jalasayattinatuttettiyappeal avite oru kuttam alukal tannalute atukale vellam kutippikkunnatukantu. avaril ninn vittumari rantu strikal atukale tatannunirttunnatayum. atinal addeham ceadiccu: "ninnalute prasnamentan?" avariruvarum parannu: "a itayanmar avarute atukale tiriccukeantupeakunvare nannalkk vellam kutippikkanavilla. nannalute pitavanenkil avasanaya oru vrd'dhanan
